Interface UpdateSpecification<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The entity root type

    public interface UpdateSpecification<T>
    Criteria update specification.
    Since:
    3.2
    Author:
    Denis Stepanov

      Creates a WHERE clause predicate for the given entity Root and a criteria query.
